name: Ape

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The ape attacks twice with its fists.

actions.name: Fists
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 5 (1d4+3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit  range 25/50 ft.  one target. Hit: 6 (1d6+3) bludgeoning damage.

document__title: Level Up Advanced 5e Monstrous Menagerie OGL
